about_the_game:
Humanolve: A Human Evolution Card Saga is the epitome of human survival and evolution. Immerse yourself in a world thousands of years ago, as early humans took the first steps to dominate nature. Can you survive the hostilities of nature and wild life in this roguelite adventure? Or will you succumb to a mere footnote of history?

Core Features

  • Every choice matters: A simple and intuitive system involving interacting with and combining cards, yet choices have a deep and profound impact on your evolution journey.
  • Action based research system: Your actions reward you in more ways than one. You can unlock powerful tools and abilities based on your actions.
  • Deep simulation: Fulfill evolving physical and psychological needs with diverse activities—harvesting, crafting, hunting, nourishing, healing, tracking, communication, and more—yielding surprising outcomes.
  • Expansive Exploration: Traverse 10+ unique locations brimming with challenges and rewards, each offering distinct hurdles and thrilling discoveries.
  • Master the nature: Explore your surroundings, make them secure for your people to call home, harvest resources, hunt wild game, heal and nourish your tribe.
  • Memorable Endings: Encounter diverse end game scenarios, each offering a satisfying conclusion to your epic survival tale. Each scenario presents a meticulously crafted challenge, beckoning replay for maximum enjoyment!

Note: This is pre-alpha footage for reference!

  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support

  • Graphics: DirectX11+ compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a primal card-based survival odyssey in Humanolve. Lead your tribe through perilous hunts, weather the wrath of nature, and forge tools of triumph. Combine cards to craft tools and weapons, explore the wilderness, and conquer your nemesis. Your choices will shape human evolution itself.
